name: A Night Out (Team Darknesse)
description:
Mikaila, Jake and Chloe are three best friends attending the same college. One night, they decide to catch a new slasher movie that just came out. Enjoy a feel-good friendship in this short, choice-free kinetic novel.

The Team wanted to give something short and fluffy for the Summer Novel Festival jam of 2020. There are no choices, just a story told with visuals.

The awesome character sprites were made with assets by puppetbomb, the beautiful backgrounds were thanks to Akinaba, and the music, as always, is by Kevin MacLeod.

Thanks so much for checking out our little game!
